title: Fontlab: Clean Up Classes command
content:
The “Clean Up Classes” command in FL5 doesn’t appear to be doing anything. Isn’t it supposed to remove a glyph from the classes if the glyph is non-existent in the font?

Minor isssue, I know, but I’m trying to debug a FontExplorerX crash and I suspect superfluous OTF feature data is at the root of the problem.

 [‹ Font taking on wrong identity](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213081038/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18317 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fontlab 5 font file ignores kerning values ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213081038/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17113 "Go to next forum topic")
author: silas
